mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, REQUESTERID, ACCOUNTID, FROMCOMPANY, RETURNADDRESS, FROMCITY, FROMSTATE, FROMPOSTALCODE, FROMZIP4, FROMCOUNTRY, FROMPHONE, FROMEMAIL, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, RECREDITAMOUNT, POSTAGEBALANCE, ASCENDINGBALANCE, PASSPHRASE, FROMNAME, UPDATEDESCR from db_endiciauser where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, REQUESTERID, ACCOUNTID, FROMCOMPANY, RETURNADDRESS, FROMCITY, FROMSTATE, FROMPOSTALCODE, FROMZIP4, FROMCOUNTRY, FROMPHONE, FROMEMAIL, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, RECREDITAMOUNT, POSTAGEBALANCE, ASCENDINGBALANCE, PASSPHRASE, FROMNAME, UPDATEDESCR from db_endiciauser
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , REQUESTERID , ACCOUNTID , FROMCOMPANY , RETURNADDRESS , FROMCITY , FROMSTATE , FROMPOSTALCODE , FROMZIP4 , FROMCOUNTRY , FROMPHONE , FROMEMAIL , FLAG , OPER , OPERTIME , UPDATEFLAG , RECREDITAMOUNT , POSTAGEBALANCE , ASCENDINGBALANCE , PASSPHRASE , FROMNAME , UPDATEDESCR

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
REQUESTERID = #{requesterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ACCOUNTID = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMCOMPANY = #{fromcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RETURNADDRESS = #{returnaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMCITY = #{fromcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMSTATE = #{fromstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMPOSTALCODE = #{frompostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMZIP4 = #{fromzip4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMCOUNTRY = #{fromcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMPHONE = #{fromphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FROMEMAIL = #{fromemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RECREDITAMOUNT = #{recreditamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
POSTAGEBALANCE = #{postagebalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ASCENDINGBALANCE = #{ascendingbalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PASSPHRASE = #{passphrase,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
FROMNAME = #{fromname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
UPDATEDESCR = #{updatedescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
